title: WHY RENT WHEN YOU CAN BUY!!
posting_body: ["Many renters think they don't have enough money to buy a house when in reality if your paying around 2,000 a month for rent, then you may qualify for a mortgage and buy a home!", 'Owning a home has so many benefits one of them being your monthly payments goes towards something valuable and you gain equity in your home.', 'When you are renting your money is not benefiting you at all, it just making your landlord richer.', 'If you are considering purchasing a home please feel free to call or send me an email and I will be happy to walk you through the process.', 'Thank you,', 'Regine Wasserman', 'Loan Officer', '330 Passaic Avenue, Suite 204, Fairfield, NJ, 07004', 'T: (862) 343-8084 | M: (718) 908-1766', 'F: (862) 343-8084', 'NMLS ID:1935487']
